mapper.select: SELECT FsUser.id ,FsUser.uid ,FsUser.nick ,FsUser.sfrom ,FsUser.name ,FsUser.process ,FsUser.phone ,FsUser.mpic ,FsUser.deleted ,FsUser.created_at ,FsUser.modified_at FROM FsUser WHERE FsUser.id = #{id}

SELECT FsUser.id ,FsUser.uid ,FsUser.nick ,FsUser.sfrom ,FsUser.name ,FsUser.process ,FsUser.phone ,FsUser.mpic ,FsUser.deleted ,FsUser.created_at ,FsUser.modified_at FROM FsUser WHERE FsUser.id is not null AND FsUser.uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uid}, '%') AND FsUser.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nick}, '%') AND FsUser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND FsUser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) AND FsUser.process = #{process} AND FsUser.deleted = #{deleted}

SELECT FsUser.id ,FsUser.uid ,FsUser.nick ,FsUser.sfrom ,FsUser.name ,FsUser.process ,FsUser.phone ,FsUser.mpic ,FsUser.deleted ,FsUser.created_at ,FsUser.modified_at FROM FsUser WHERE FsUser.id is not null AND FsUser.uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uid}, '%') AND FsUser.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nick}, '%') AND FsUser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND FsUser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) AND FsUser.process = #{process} AND FsUser.deleted = #{deleted} ORDER BY FsUser.created_at ORDER BY FsUser.title ASC DESC LIMIT #{callpage}, #{perpage}

SELECT count(FsUser.id) as listsize FROM FsUser WHERE FsUser.id is not null AND FsUser.uid LIKE CONCAT('%', #{uid}, '%') AND FsUser.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nick}, '%') AND FsUser.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') AND FsUser.phone LIKE CONCAT('%', #{phone}) AND FsUser.process = #{process} AND FsUser.deleted = #{deleted}
